sentences.en: A protracted malaise will spawn an angry search for scapegoats.
sentences.cn: 这种不满情绪会不断扩大去寻找替罪羊.

sentences.en: All Necromancer pets now play a spawn animation when they are summoned.
sentences.cn: 现在所有的死灵宠物发挥产卵动画当他们被传唤.

sentences.en: And there is concern it could spawn tornadoes and flooding.
sentences.cn: 也可以关注飓风和洪水产生.

sentences.en: Any flower placed indoors, however, obviously cannot spawn new flowers.
sentences.cn: 任何花在屋里安置, 不过, 显而易见不能大量生产新花.

sentences.en: Examples of basic successful spawn diagrams are shown below.
sentences.cn: 基本的成功的卵图解的例子被显示如下.

sentences.en: Fixed Zombies continuing to spawn when the game is over.
sentences.cn: 修正了小僵尸在游戏结束后还不断被召唤出来.

sentences.en: How can you spawn, seek and seize and opportunities?
sentences.cn: 怎样才能创造 、 寻找并抓住机遇?

sentences.en: How can you spawn, seek and seize chances and opportunities?
sentences.cn: (怎样才能创造 、 寻找并抓住机遇? )

sentences.en: I found a mass of spawn in the fish before cooking.
sentences.cn: 烧鱼前,我发现鱼里有很多鱼籽.

sentences.en: Many sea fishes spawn in rivers.
sentences.cn: 许多海洋鱼类是在淡水河里产卵的.

sentences.en: Nakatomi conglomerate stole a shard of Akujiki, breaking the hell spawn seal.
sentences.cn: 中臣财团就是偷了恶食碎片, 然后破坏了式神的封印.

sentences.en: New technology has spawned new business opportunities.
sentences.cn: 新技术创造了大量新的商机。

sentences.en: Some fish, like salmon , may be prevented from swimming upstream to spawn.
sentences.cn: 一些鱼类, 例如大马哈鱼, 可能因此无法溯流产卵.

sentences.en: The fish were madly pushing their way upstream to spawn.
sentences.cn: 鱼群为产卵而疯狂地向上游挤进.

sentences.en: You spawn right next to the enemy tank.
sentences.cn: 你的重生点刚好在敌军坦克旁!

words.tran_cn: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产

trans.tran_cn: （鱼、蛙等的）子，卵，（裂殖菌类植物的）丝，菌，产物，结果
trans.tran_en: the eggs of a fish or  frog  laid together in a soft mass

trans.tran_cn: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产
trans.tran_en: to make a series of things happen or start to exist
